import jxl.* import jxl.write.*
Workbook workbook1 = Workbook.getWorkbook(new File("${projectDir}/N600_FT_API_Data_Sheet.xls")) sheet1 = workbook1.getSheet("MasterSheet") Cell a1 = sheet1.getCell(1,18) log.info a1.getContents() workbook1.close() testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("Endpoint", a1.getContents())

con:testCase.name: gettingAuthorization
con:testCase.con:tearDownScript: def token = context.expand( '${auth#ResponseAsXml#declare namespace ns1=\'https://ssoa.sterbc.com/as/token.oauth2\'; //ns1:Response[1]/ns1:access_token[1]}' ) log.info "token----"+token def Authorization = "Bearer "+ token log.info "Authorization----"+Authorization testRunner.testCase.project.setPropertyValue('Authorization',Authorization)
